channel.title: Some "Perfect" Skilling Classes
channel.description:
Well, since I took down my server a while ago, there's no point in keeping these away from you. I didn't put much effort into the classes, as they were easy, but are still very good.
[b]Notes[/b] -They were made for DeltaScape servers, so you're going to have to remove the shitty skills already added. -The mining includes a dragon pickaxe. Just remove it if you don't have one. -Crafting uses my custom interface. However, if you don't want that, it still includes very decent gem cutting. -These are only the classes. You're going to need to learn how to start them, use them, and end them. Good luck.
[b]Skills[/b] -[b]Fishing[/b] (10 fishable... fish in all. They work properly, with animation, primary items (Net, fishing pole, etc), and secondary items (bait, feathers) -[b]Cooking[/b] (Great cooking and burning rates. All fish you can catch are cookable) -[b]Mining[/b] (Clay rocks are essence, just so you know) -[b]Crafting[/b] (Gem cutting and use of my interface, which is used to make jewelry) -[b]Smithing[/b] (Smelting, and both bar on anvil. The smithing requires ores just like RuneScape, and has working iron bars with RoF) I would include Agility, but it includes a lot of code in the client class, so I'm not gonna.
[b][url=http://uppit.com/v/7WNS1PBN]Download[/url][/b]
Because most people most likely won't know how to implement these, depending on the replies, I'll post the whole source (Which includes probably one of the best Pest Control minigames in all RSPS).
Here's some of the screenshots I took for the server. [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rscookingbass.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rsburntmanta.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rsfishingbass.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rsfishingmanta.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rsfishingpike.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rsmining.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rssmeltingiron.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rssmeltingrune.jpg[/img] [img]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg146/antiLin/rssmithing.jpg[/img]
Enjoy. Don't leech, please.
~Lin

item.title: Some "Perfect" Skilling Classes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, since I took down my server a while ago, there’s no point in keeping these away from you. I didn’t put much effort into the classes, as they were easy, but are still very good.

Notes
-They were made for DeltaScape servers, so you’re going to have to remove the shitty skills already added.
-The mining includes a dragon pickaxe. Just remove it if you don’t have one.
-Crafting uses my custom interface. However, if you don’t want that, it still includes very decent gem cutting.
-These are only the classes. You’re going to need to learn how to start them, use them, and end them. Good luck.

Skills
-Fishing (10 fishable… fish in all. They work properly, with animation, primary items (Net, fishing pole, etc), and secondary items (bait, feathers)
-Cooking (Great cooking and burning rates. All fish you can catch are cookable)
-Mining (Clay rocks are essence, just so you know)
-Crafting (Gem cutting and use of my interface, which is used to make jewelry)
-Smithing (Smelting, and both bar on anvil. The smithing requires ores just like RuneScape, and has working iron bars with RoF)
I would include Agility, but it includes a lot of code in the client class, so I’m not gonna.

Download

Because most people most likely won’t know how to implement these, depending on the replies, I’ll post the whole source (Which includes probably one of the best Pest Control minigames in all RSPS).

Here’s some of the screenshots I took for the server.








Enjoy. Don’t leech, please.

~Lin

Read full topic
